option_token_desc.message: keep empty if no secret token is specified

option_capture_desc.message: capture browser downloads based on built-in filters

option_filesize_desc.message: capture downloads those are larger than

option_fileext_desc.message: capture downloads with listed file extensions, <u>one entry per line</u>

option_monitored_desc.message: capture downloads on these web hosts, <u>one entry per line</u>

option_ignored_desc.message: do NOT capture downloads on these web hosts, one entry per line
